title.rendered: GME TX3100VP UHF CB RADIO 5 WATT SUPER COMPACT STARTER KIT

content.rendered:
GME TX3100VP UHF CB RADIO 5 WATT SUPER COMPACT STARTER KIT

GME TX3100VP UHF CB Radio 5 Watt Super Compact Starter Kit available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

With the TX3100VP Starter Kit, you’ll begin your UHF CB experience with everything you need.

Coupling the TX3100DP UHF CB radio with the AE4018K2 high performance UHF CB antenna and MB407SS mounting bracket, the TX3100VP is the complete package.

The TX3100DP features a super compact chassis and innovative ‘flip’ feature ensuring seamless installation whilst incorporating the latest in Digital Signal Processing (DSP) technology.

Combining the very latest in electronic hardware with the most advanced design and manufacturing techniques to produce an extremely compact mobile radio with outstanding specifications and performance at an affordable price point.

The TX3100DP, with its front mounted controls, is designed for unobtrusive mounting in modern vehicles and features a built-in speaker housed within an extremely compact case.

Features;

  • Digital Signal Processing
  • Advanced Signal Management
  • Dynamic Volume Control
  • Unique Display Flip Function
  • Adjustable squelch
  • Programmable scan function
  • CTCSS and DCS
  • Selectable duplex channels
  • External speaker socket
  • Five year warranty
  • Australian designed and engineered
  • Includes AE4018K2

CLICK HERE to view the full range of products available for your 4×4!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
